summary: This is a very small and nice mod that basically replaces all the Skyrim day soundtracks with Morrowind ones. Nostalgia stroke me, so i decided to do such addon.
descriptionHtml:
[u]*This mod will replace all the day music with Morrowind tracks, also replaces the main menu theme with Morrowind theme. [/u]
[u](Doesn't replace dusk, night and cities music [b]yet, [/b]but that's surely gonna change)[/u]

*It's a very simple mod made mainly with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8303/?]Skyrim Audio Converter[/url] by JohnB, so lots of thanks to him for creating that tool.

*There is a preview video in the videos section, featuring "Dance of Swords" track.

*Of course, all the music tracks belong to Bethesda, I made this mod only for fun, to bring some good and old Morrowind into Skyrim.

*As for requirements, I don't think you need anything else besides the Skyrim itself (that's pretty obvious)

*If time allows, I'll try to update this mod and replace even more Skyrim tracks with Morrowind or maybe even Oblivion music.
[u]
*Installation - simply put the folder "music" into your Skyrim Data folder. It won't overwrite anything, unless you downloaded other music replacing mods. To uninstall delete the folder "music" from data.[/u]

*Also, this is my first mod. If there are any copyright problems, contact me and I will immediately remove the mod.
author: Lazzer
